author: mturk
msg: Use 404 instead 403 when client tries to access WEB-INF.
This is to comply with Servlet spec.

author: mturk
msg: Add -DJK_PREFORK define for Apache1.3 as default.

author: mturk
msg: Add --enable-prefork configure flag so that threading code can be
excluded when compiling for apache1 or apache2/prefork.

author: mturk
msg: Add non blocking connect to Tomcat. It enables the true socket_timeout
